content: The outbreak of World War II, in 1939, made it impossible to carry out the match between Alexander Alekhine and Paul Keres for the World Chess Championship at that time.
translations: ita:Lo scoppio della seconda guerra mondiale, nel 1939, rese impossibile lo svolgimento delle partite tra Alexander Alekhine
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
